<p align="center"><i>This cookie bar is for the Contao Open Source CMS and allows a visitor to define cookie & privacy settings for the website.</i></p>
<p align="center">
    <a href="https://www.oveleon.de"><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/oveleon-maintained-83aa0e?logo=data:image/png;base64," alt="Oveleon"></a>
    <a href="https://github.com/oveleon/contao-cookiebar"><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/license-AGPLv3-83aa0e"/></a>
    <a href="https://packagist.org/packages/oveleon/contao-cookiebar"><img src="https://img.shields.io/packagist/dt/oveleon/contao-cookiebar?color=0A7BBC"/></a>
</p>
<br/>

---

## Version 1.x (Contao 4.13)

> [!IMPORTANT]
> Version 1.x of contao-cookiebar is no longer actively maintained and will only receive critical security fixes if
> required. Bug reports for 1.x will no longer be addressed and worked on.

---

## Support

If you like the Contao cookie bar, we'd love your support in keeping the open-source spirit alive.

If you think this plugin is useful, please consider [sponsoring us](https://github.com/sponsors/oveleon) to help
contribute to our time invested and to further development of this and other open source projects.

Your contributions, whether through `coding`, `testing`, `providing feedback`, or even
a [donation](https://github.com/sponsors/oveleon), help ensure that we can continue offering free open source software.
Join us in making a difference, and thank you for your support! - [Oveleon](https://www.oveleon.de).

[![](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label=Sponsor&message=%E2%9D%A4&logo=GitHub&color=%23fe8e86)](https://github.com/sponsors/oveleon)

---

## Features

- Flexible script integration
- Vanilla JS
- Expandable
- Consent Log
- Free & Open Source

---

## Services

- Custom (Script)
- Custom (Template)
- Google Analytics
- Google Consent Mode
- Facebook Pixel
- Matomo
- Matomo Tag Manager
- etracker
- iFrame
    - YouTube
    - Vimeo
    - Google Maps
    - OpenStreetMap
    - [add more...](docs/EXTEND_IFRAME.md)
- [add more...](docs/EXTEND_TYPE.md)

---

---

## Contributing

If you use an LLM such as ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude etc. to assist you heavily with your code, you must state so in
your contribution. You are responsible for reviewing the generated content before opening a pull request for it.
Submitting unreviewed LLM-generated code will result in your pull request being rejected.

Please understand that generated content can be difficult or even impossible to review and may cost us significant extra
time in reviewing.

---

## Community Extensions

- [Contao Cookiebar Optin](https://github.com/postyou/contao-cookiebar-optin): Extends the cookie bar with an opt-in
  functionality for content elements. ([@postyou](https://github.com/postyou))

---

## Disclaimer

### We do not save your data 🚫

> This Consent Tool does **not** need its own cookies. Please **do not refer to Oveleon** within your website, no data
> will be passed to Oveleon!

### Liability and legal security ⚖️

> We cannot guarantee complete legal security. Use this extension at your own risk or contact a lawyer if you are not
> sure about the configuration. Please understand that we cannot answer any legal questions. For questions of technical
> nature, feel free to contact us.
